<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Herd Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2349)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 210 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

All _herd masks_ are linked to at least one other _herd mask_ and are usually sold in sets of multiple masks. Linked _herd masks_ look like one another, with only the slightest of differences to tell them apart.

<document level="2" id="action-1901" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69). You can link a _herd mask_ you create to another _herd mask_ in your possession when you finish crafting it, which causes it to be linked to the chosen mask as well as all other _herd masks_ that are also linked to the chosen mask.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Herd Mask

text: <title level="1" right="Item 6" pfs="Standard" > Herd Mask Source Treasure Vault pg. 154 1.1 , Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic pg. 73 Price 210 gp Usage worn mask --- All herd masks are linked to at least one other herd mask and are usually sold in sets of multiple masks. Linked herd masks look like one another, with only the slightest of differences to tell them apart. Craft Requirements Supply a casting of dimension door . You can link a herd mask you create to another herd mask in your possession when you finish crafting it, which causes it to be linked to the chosen mask as well as all other herd masks that are also linked to the chosen mask.
